00031 RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::ChartBase(int width, int height){
00032   imageWidth=width;
00033   imageHeight=height;
00034 
00035   exteriorMargin=10;
00036   legendWidth=180;
00037   legendExteriorMargin=10;
00038 
00039   graphTitle="RainbruRPG-netflooder statistics";
00040 
00041   yAxisCaption="Left caption";
00042   xAxisCaption="Bottom caption test filling";
00043 
00044   titleFontSize=16;
00045   captionFontSize=10;
00046   legendTitleFontSize=11;
00047 
00048   filename="test.png";
00049 
00050   chartSerieList=new tChartSerieList();
00051 
00052   initSeriesColors();
00053 
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00060 RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::~ChartBase(){
00061   delete chartSerieList;
00062 }
00063 
00067 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::draw(){
00068   computeMargins();
00069   /* Declare the image */
00070   gdImagePtr im;
00071   /* Declare output files */
00072   FILE *pngout;
00073   /* Declare color indexes */
00074   int black;
00075   int white;
00076   int lightGray;
00077 
00078   im = gdImageCreateTrueColor(imageWidth, imageHeight);
00079 
00080   // Allocate the colors
00081   black = gdTrueColor(0, 0, 0);  
00082   white = gdTrueColor(255, 255, 255);  
00083   lightGray = gdTrueColor(220, 240, 220);  
00084 
00085   // white background
00086   gdImageFilledRectangle(im, 1, 1, imageWidth-2, imageHeight-2, white);
00087 
00088   // Drawing private functions 
00089   drawAxis(im, black);
00090   drawChartTitle(im, black);
00091   drawYAxisCaption(im, black);
00092   drawXAxisCaption(im, black);
00093   drawLegendBackground(im, black, lightGray);
00094 
00095   // Save file
00096   pngout = fopen(filename, "wb");
00097   gdImagePng(im, pngout);
00098   fclose(pngout);
00099 
00100   // Destroy the image in memory.
00101   gdImageDestroy(im);
00102 }
00103 
00112 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::drawChartTitle(gdImagePtr im, int c){
00113   int bottom=imageHeight-(exteriorMargin)-(titleMargin/2)+(titleFontSize/2);
00114   int tWidth=getTextWidth(graphTitle, titleFontSize);
00115   int left=(imageWidth/2)-(tWidth/2);
00116 
00117   drawTrueType(graphTitle, left, bottom, im, c, titleFontSize);
00118 }

00131 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::drawSmallText(const std::string& text, int x, int y, 
00132                               gdImagePtr im, int c){
00133 
00134 
00135   int len = text.length() + 1;
00136   std::vector<unsigned char> raw(len);
00137   const char* str = text.c_str();
00138  
00139   std::copy(str, str + len, raw.begin());
00140 
00141   gdFontPtr font=gdFontGetSmall();
00142   gdImageString(im, font, x, y, &(raw[0]), c);
00143 
00144 }

00182 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::
00183 drawTrueType(const std::string& text, int x, 
00184 int y, gdImagePtr im, int c, int fontSize){
00185 
00186   int rect[8];
00187   char* fontName="ttf-lucida/LucidaSansRegular.ttf";
00188 
00189   int len = text.length() + 1;
00190   std::vector<char> raw(len);
00191   const char* str = text.c_str();
00192   std::copy(str, str + len, raw.begin());
00193 
00194   gdImageStringFT(im, &rect[0], c, fontName, 
00195                   fontSize, 0, x, y,&(raw[0]));
00196 
00197 
00198 }

00211 int RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::getTextWidth(const std::string& text, int fontSize){
00212   int rect[8];
00213   char* fontName="ttf-lucida/LucidaSansRegular.ttf";
00214 
00215   int len = text.length() + 1;
00216   std::vector<char> raw(len);
00217   const char* str = text.c_str();
00218   std::copy(str, str + len, raw.begin());
00219 
00220   // Only get the rect array filled with correct values
00221   gdImageStringFT(NULL, &rect[0], 0, fontName, 
00222                   fontSize, 0, 0, 0,&(raw[0]));
00223 
00224   int textWidth=rect[2]-rect[0];
00225 
00226   return textWidth;
00227 }
00228 
00240 int RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::getTextHeight(const std::string& text, int fontSize){
00241   int rect[8];
00242   char* fontName="ttf-lucida/LucidaSansRegular.ttf";
00243 
00244   int len = text.length() + 1;
00245   std::vector<char> raw(len);
00246   const char* str = text.c_str();
00247   std::copy(str, str + len, raw.begin());
00248 
00249   // Only get the rect array filled with correct values
00250   gdImageStringFT(NULL, &rect[0], 0, fontName, 
00251                   fontSize, 0, 0, 0,&(raw[0]));
00252 
00253   int textHeight=rect[3]-rect[5];
00254 
00255   return textHeight;
00256 }

00270 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::drawTrueTypeUp(const std::string& text, int x, 
00271                                int y, gdImagePtr im, int c, int fontSize){
00272 
00273   int rect[8];
00274   char* fontName="ttf-lucida/LucidaSansRegular.ttf";
00275 
00276   int len = text.length() + 1;
00277   std::vector<char> raw(len);
00278   const char* str = text.c_str();
00279   std::copy(str, str + len, raw.begin());
00280 
00281   gdImageStringFT(im, &rect[0], c, fontName, 
00282                   fontSize, PI/2, x, y,&(raw[0]));
00283 
00284 }

00292 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::computeMargins(){
00293   titleMargin=titleFontSize+10;
00294   leftCaptionMargin=captionFontSize+10;
00295   bottomCaptionMargin=leftCaptionMargin;
00296 }
00307 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::
00308 drawLegendBackground(gdImagePtr im, int bc, int fc){
00309 
00310   int top=0+exteriorMargin+legendExteriorMargin;
00311   int bottom=imageHeight-exteriorMargin-titleMargin-legendExteriorMargin;
00312   int right= imageWidth-(exteriorMargin/2)-legendExteriorMargin;
00313   int left= imageWidth-(exteriorMargin/2)-legendWidth+legendExteriorMargin;
00314 
00315   gdImageFilledRectangle(im, left, top, right, bottom, fc);
00316   gdImageRectangle(im, left, top, right, bottom, bc);
00317 
00318   int textWidth=getTextWidth("Legend", legendTitleFontSize);
00319   int textHeight=getTextHeight("Legend", legendTitleFontSize);
00320   int titleLeft=left+(legendWidth/2)-(textWidth/2)-6;
00321   int titleTop=top+textHeight+2;
00322 
00323   drawTrueType("Legend", titleLeft, titleTop, im, bc, legendTitleFontSize);
00324 }
00325 
00332 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::drawAxis(gdImagePtr im, int c){
00333   int bottom=imageHeight-exteriorMargin-titleMargin-bottomCaptionMargin;
00334   int left=0+exteriorMargin+leftCaptionMargin;
00335   int right=imageWidth-exteriorMargin-legendWidth-legendExteriorMargin;
00336 
00337   // right vertical line
00338   gdImageLine(im, left, 0+exteriorMargin, left, bottom, c);  
00339 
00340   // Bottom horizontal line
00341   gdImageLine(im, left, bottom, right, bottom, c);  
00342 
00343 }
00353 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::addSerie(ChartSerie* s){
00354   chartSerieList->push_back(s);
00355 }

00362 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::initSeriesColors(){
00363   seriesColor.push_back(gdTrueColor(255, 0, 0));
00364   seriesColor.push_back(gdTrueColor(0, 255, 0));
00365   seriesColor.push_back(gdTrueColor(0, 0, 255));
00366 }
00367 
00375 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::addSerieColor(int r, int g, int b ){
00376   seriesColor.push_back(gdTrueColor( r, g, b ));
00377 }
00378 
00387 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::
00388 changeSerieColor(int index, int r, int g, int b){
00389   seriesColor[index]=gdTrueColor( r, g, b );
00390 }

00398 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::drawXAxisCaption(gdImagePtr im, int c){
00399   // The width of the text to drawn
00400   int textWidth=getTextWidth(xAxisCaption, captionFontSize);
00401   // The text must be centered below the graph so we compute
00402   // the graph's width
00403   int graphWidth=imageWidth-legendWidth-(exteriorMargin*2)
00404     -(legendExteriorMargin*2)-leftCaptionMargin;
00405 
00406   int bottom=imageHeight-exteriorMargin-titleMargin-
00407     (captionFontSize+5);//+captionFontSize+5);
00408 
00409   int left=0+leftCaptionMargin+exteriorMargin+(graphWidth/2)-(textWidth/2);
00410   drawTrueType(xAxisCaption, left, bottom, im, c, captionFontSize);
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00420 void RainbruRPG::Core::ChartBase::drawYAxisCaption(gdImagePtr im, int c){
00421   // We must find the graph height
00422   int graphHeigth=imageHeight-(exteriorMargin*2)-titleMargin
00423     -bottomCaptionMargin;
00424 
00425   int textWidth=getTextWidth(yAxisCaption, captionFontSize);
00426 
00427 
00428   int left=0+(exteriorMargin)+captionFontSize+5;
00429   int bottom=exteriorMargin+(graphHeigth/2)+(textWidth/2);
00430 
00431   drawTrueTypeUp(yAxisCaption, left, bottom, im, c, captionFontSize);
00432 
00433 }
